content.query:
-- CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD ='MyPassword20#0';

-- CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL sqlondemand
-- WITH IDENTITY='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',  
-- SECRET = '?sv=2020-08-04&ss=b&srt=c&sp=rwdlacx&se=2023-04-29T07:28:37Z&st=2022-04-28T23:28:37Z&spr=https&sig=8vr9AEPf%2BMu1VCCavU7VyOC8y0crkxhNUX%2FQBcBZ2pw%3D'
-- GO

-- CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT DeltaLakeFormat WITH (  FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA );
--GO
-- CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [STG_EDS] WITH
-- (
-- 	LOCATION = 'https://synstg.blob.core.windows.net/syn-fs'
-- )

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[dimWatermarks]
(
	[TableName] [varchar](100),
	[LastKey] [BIGINT](100)
)
WITH
(
	LOCATION = '/dimWatermarks',
	DATA_SOURCE = STG_EDS,
	FILE_FORMAT = DeltaLakeFormat
)


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[DimCustomer]
(
	[CustomerId] INT,
	[CompanyName] [nvarchar](128) ,
	[EmailAddress] [nvarchar](50) ,
	[FirstName] [varchar](100),
	[LastName] [varchar](100),
	MiddleName	[varchar](100),
	ModifiedDate	NameStyle	Phone	SalesPerson	Suffix	Title	DateInserted	CompanyName_Prev	UserName	Domain	EffectiveFromDate	EffectiveToDate	IsActive	RowSignature	CustomerKey

	
	[Title] [nvarchar](8) NULL,
	
	[MiddleName] [dbo].[Name] NULL,
	[LastName] [dbo].[Name] NOT NULL,
	[Suffix] [nvarchar](10) NULL,
	
	[SalesPerson] [nvarchar](256) NULL,

	[Phone] [dbo].[Phone] NULL,
)
WITH
(
	LOCATION = '/DimCustomer',
	DATA_SOURCE = STG_EDS,
	FILE_FORMAT = DeltaLakeFormat
)

-- CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE SqlOnDemandDemo WITH (
--      LOCATION = 'https://synstg.blob.core.windows.net',
--      CREDENTIAL = sqlondemand
--  );
-- GO
